venue.address_2: Suite 188 - at the end of the pier
venue.name: Fenway Bark

item.description:
We have limited space so please RSVP if you'd like to attend as we can only accommodate about 30 dogs. The first 30 to RSVP are guaranteed a spot.  We must have at least 10 pugs attending or we will have to cancel the Meetup so please RSVP accordingly.

Fenway Bark does charge a $5 fee per pug per Meetup.  The facility is very clean and well managed and they require all pugs attending the Meetups to have veterinary proof of: Rabies, Distemper, Bordetella vaccinations and a negative fecal result. You will not be able to participate in the Meetup without these records from your vet.  You will only have to supply this info on your first visit and Fenway Bark has will keep it on file. If you have not visited Fenway Bark definitely check out the website…it’s amazing!  http://fenwaybarkonline.com/

 

Our Meetup's occur on the first Sunday of the month @ 12pm.

Thanks everyone and we look forward to seeing you!!
item.name: Boston Pug Meetup
